configuration.title: CWTools configuration
configuration.cwtools.trace.server.descr: Traces the communication between VSCode and the language server.
configuration.cwtools.localisation.langu: The list of languages to validate localisation for.
configuration.cwtools.localisation.gener: The string used when generating localisation strings.
configuration.cwtools.errors.vanilla.des: Whether or not to show errors for vanilla files
configuration.cwtools.errors.ignore.desc: Error codes to ignore, list of IDs
configuration.cwtools.errors.ignorefiles: Files to ignore errors from, list of file names
configuration.cwtools.experimental.descr: Whether or not to enable experimental features
configuration.cwtools.debug_mode.descrip: Debug features for helping write rules
configuration.cwtools.logging.diagnostic: Whether to output diagnostic level logs
configuration.cwtools.rules_version.desc: Which version of rules to auto-update to. Manual will use the local path set in rules_folder
configuration.cwtools.rules_folder.descr: A folder containing custom rules to use
configuration.cwtools.ignore_patterns.de: File paths to ignore (not load into cwtools), list of glob patterns
configuration.cwtools.cache.eu4.descript: The location of a vanilla EU4 installation
configuration.cwtools.cache.hoi4.descrip: The location of a vanilla HOI4 installation
configuration.cwtools.cache.stellaris.de: The location of a vanilla Stellaris installation
configuration.cwtools.cache.ck2.descript: The location of a vanilla CK2 installation
configuration.cwtools.cache.imperator.de: The location of a vanilla I:R installation
configuration.cwtools.cache.vic2.descrip: The location of a vanilla VIC2 installation
configuration.cwtools.cache.ck3.descript: The location of a vanilla CK3 installation
configuration.cwtools.cache.vic3.descrip: The location of a vanilla VIC3 installation
configuration.cwtools.graph.zoomSensitiv: Control scroll wheel zoom sensitivity, <1 reduces sensitivity, >1 increases sensitivity
configuration.cwtools.maxFileSize.descri: Maximum script file size to load in megabytes (warning, very large files can cause instability or invalid diagnostics)
configuration.cwtools.localisation.repla: The text to create new localisation strings with, should contain "%s" for the location of the id
